name: CRYPTOPLASM EPHEMERA 04
description: This work is part of the “Blocks On Blockchain” exhibition hosted by the Italian Virtual Pavilion of the Venice Architecture Biennale 2021, curated by Tom Kovac with Arts Letters and Numbers. This Ephemera shows the progressive exploration of the CRYPTOPLASM concept. It is made from a relic of WORKSITE II which took place in Bruxelles on the 8 September 2018 at A Performance Affair, curated by Liv Vaisberg, Frédéric de Goldschmidt and Will Kerr. This 3D scanned brick and mortar is recomposed to build an autonomous architectural vocabulary that will be adopted to create complete AR or printed cryptoplasmic architectures. This NFT is registered in the Cryptoplasm Table of Elements.
